00075 #ifndef _LocalSpacePolar_h
00076 #define _LocalSpacePolar_h
00077 
00078 #include "BaseSRF.h"
00079 #include "Coord.h"
00080 #include "Exception.h"
00081 
00082 namespace srm
00083 {
00090 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL SRF_LocalSpacePolar: public BaseSRF_2D
00091 {
00092 public:
00096     static SRF_LocalSpacePolar* create( SRM_ORM_Code orm,
00097                                         SRM_RT_Code  rt );
00098 
00102     static SRF_LocalSpacePolar* create( SRM_SRF_Parameters_Info srf_params )
00103     {
00104         return create( srf_params.value.srf_template.orm_code, srf_params.rt_code );
00105     }
00106 
00109     Coord2D* createCoordinate2D(SRM_Long_Float coord_comp1,
00110                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp2 );
00111 
00114     virtual bool isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const;
00115 
00116 
00118     virtual SRF_ClassType getClassType() const
00119     {
00120         return BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_LSP;
00121     }
00122 
00126     bool isEqual( const SRF_LocalSpacePolar &srf ) const;
00127 
00131     bool operator==( const SRF_LocalSpacePolar &rhs ) const;
00132 
00136     SRF_LocalSpacePolar* makeCopy() const;
00137 
00138 
00142     const char* toString();
00143 
00144 protected:
00145 
00146     friend class BaseSRF;
00147     friend class BaseSRF_3D;
00148     friend class BaseSRF_WithEllipsoidalHeight;
00149     SRF_LocalSpacePolar( void *impl ) : BaseSRF_2D(impl) {} 
00150     SRF_LocalSpacePolar &operator =( const SRF_LocalSpacePolar & ) { return *this; } 
00151     virtual ~SRF_LocalSpacePolar() {} 
00152 };
00153 
00154 
00155 inline bool SRF_LocalSpacePolar::isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const
00156 {
00157     if (type == BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_LSP)
00158         return true;
00159     else
00160         return BaseSRF_2D::isA(type);
00161 };
00162 
00163 
00165 typedef SRF_LocalSpacePolar SRF_LSP;
00166 
00167 
00172 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar: public Coord2D
00173 {
00174 public:
00177     Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar( SRF_LocalSpacePolar *srf,
00178                              SRM_Long_Float angle = 0.0,
00179                              SRM_Long_Float radius = 0.0 )
00180     : Coord2D(srf)
00181     {
00182         setComponentValues(angle, radius);
00183     }
00184 
00187     Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar( const Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar &coord )
00188     : Coord2D(coord._srf)
00189     {
00190         setComponentValues( coord._values[0], coord._values[1] );
00191     }
00192 
00198     void copyTo( Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar &coord ) const
00199     {
00200         if (coord._srf != _srf)
00201             throw Exception( SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_SOURCE_COORDINATE, "copyTo: Coordinate associated with a difference SRF" );
00202 
00203         coord._values[0] = _values[0];
00204         coord._values[1] = _values[1];
00205     }
00206 
00210     bool isEqual( const Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar &coord ) const
00211     {
00212         return (_srf == coord._srf &&
00213                 _values[0] == coord._values[0] &&
00214                 _values[1] == coord._values[1] );
00215     }
00216 
00219     void setComponentValues( SRM_Long_Float angle, SRM_Long_Float radius )
00220     {
00221         _values[1] = radius;
00222         _values[0] = angle;
00223     }
00224 
00227     SRM_Long_Float get_radius() const
00228     {
00229         return _values[1];
00230     }
00231 
00234     SRM_Long_Float get_angle() const
00235     {
00236         return _values[0];
00237     }
00238 
00241     void set_radius( SRM_Long_Float value )
00242     {
00243         _values[1] = value;
00244     }
00245 
00248     void set_angle( SRM_Long_Float value )
00249     {
00250         _values[0] = value;
00251     }
00252 
00255     virtual bool isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const;
00256 
00259     virtual Coord_ClassType getClassType() const
00260     {
00261         return Coord::COORD_TYP_LSP;
00262     }
00263 
00266     bool operator==( const Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar &rhs ) const;
00267 };
00268 
00269 
00270 inline bool Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar::isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const
00271 {
00272     if (type == Coord::COORD_TYP_LSP)
00273         return true;
00274     else
00275         return Coord2D::isA(type);
00276 };
00277 
00278 
00280 typedef Coord2D_LocalSpacePolar Coord2D_LSP;
